item.title: Coast Guard rescues missing woman shouting for help in wilderness
item.description: A 64-year-old woman was rescued from an Oregon state park where she had been stranded for almost two full days, the U.S. Coast Guard said.

item.title: Make these 3 big gold investing moves before 2025, experts say
item.description: If you want to invest in gold by year's end, here's how (and how not) to do it, according to experts.

item.title: Inflation remains sticky, with CPI rising 2.7% from a year ago
item.description: Inflation has cooled from its most recent peak, but progress in getting it to a 2% annual rate has been slow.

item.title: Judge rejects bankruptcy sale of Alex Jones' Infowars to The Onion
item.description: The judge criticized the auction process as flawed and said the outcome "left a lot of money on the table" for Sandy Hook families.

item.title: Judge blocks supermarket mega-merger
item.description: On Tuesday, a proposed mega-merger between two of America's largest supermarket chains was blocked in the courts. The deal would have seen Kroger acqu...
